old:
かつて覚者はレスタニアの王、そして次代の竜にな
るさだめだった

　しかし、３２４年前に状況が変わった。黄金竜との
戦いで傷ついた白竜が完全なる回復を遂げるまでの
間、自らを守る戦士として数人の覚者を生み出したの
だ

　彼らは古来からの作法に従い、白竜に心臓を預ける
代わりに竜力を受け取った。回復の途上にある白竜を
狙って近づく魔物を蹴散らすことが彼らのさだめだっ
た。希望者は絶えることなく、白竜は定期的に覚者を
増やした

　やがて、時とともに覚者たちの意識に変化が生じ
た。白竜のそばに控えることが、すべてではなくなっ
たのだ

　彼らはレスタニア全土に広がり、各地で暮らす人々
のために戦うようになった。土地に縛られず、あちこ
ちを移動して問題を解決する者も現れ、頼りにされる
ようになった

　もちろん、昔と同じく、この神殿に集う者も少なく
はない。今回誕生した覚者たちはどうだろう

　さて、気になる事件が二件起こっている。グリッテ
ン砦が、ついにオークどもに侵入されてしまった

　守備隊のヴァネッサと応援に行ったレオたちが見事
撃退したようだが、今後のオークの動向が気になると
ころだ

　加えて、多くの人々が目撃した、空を横切る巨大な
石塊も悩ましい。天変地異の類か、それとも誰か――
たとえば、信じがたいがオーク――の仕業か

　どこに落ちたのだろうか。ゲルト騎士団長が落下地
点を特定するための捜索部隊を派遣したとの報告を受
けている
new:
Once, the Arisen were the kings of Lestania and destined to become the next dragons.

However, the situation changed 324 years ago. 

The White Dragon, who was injured in a battle against the Golden Dragon, gave birth to several Arisen to protect themselves until it fully recovered.

Following the ancient traditions, they entrusted their hearts to the White Dragon and received the power of the dragons in return. It was their destiny to scatter monsters approaching the White Dragon in the process of recovery. The White Dragon continued to create new Arisen regularly, as there were always those who sought to become one.

Eventually, the consciousness of the Arisen began to change over time. Being by the side of the White Dragon was no longer their sole purpose. They spread across all of Lestania, fighting for the people living in various places. Some even traveled around, solving problems wherever they went and became relied upon.

Of course, there are still those who gather in this temple, just like in the old days. What about the Arisen that have been born this time?

Now, there are two troubling incidents. Fort Gritten has finally been invaded by orcs.
It seems that Vanessa of the defense force and Leo, who went to support her, successfully repelled them, but we are concerned about the future movements of the orcs.

Additionally, a large boulder crossing the sky, witnessed by many people, is also worrying. Is it a natural disaster or the doing of someone—perhaps even the unbelievable act of orcs?

Where did it fall? Gerd, the commander of the knight order, has received a report that a search team has been dispatched to locate the point of impact.
